meanings.definition: In a disorderly manner; without order or organization.
meanings.sent1: The books were stacked disorderedly on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: She ran disorderedly through the crowded street.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels played disorderedly in the park, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts raced disorderedly, like a storm in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The wind blew disorderedly, scattering leaves in all directions.

meanings.definition: Characterized by disorder; chaotic or unruly.
meanings.sent1: The disorderedly room had clothes strewn everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The disorderedly classroom was hard to navigate.
meanings.sent3: The disorderedly party turned into a wild dance-off.
meanings.sent4: Her disorderedly hair matched her carefree spirit.
meanings.sent5: The disorderedly traffic made the commute unbearable.
